name: King's Spikey Castle
description:
Help a stupid king get back to his castle. 

My first game that I make and publish to itch.io

I recommend to play this at full screen since I use a small layout for my game/project.

The sprite I use is Kings and Pigs by Pixel Frog

Sfx and Background music that I use is here

https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/royalty-free-music/downloads-c/8-bit-music/6

Since this is my first game , some bugs may occur 

Update 1.3 Last Update In this week

-Added 2 new levels (Level 12: Medium, Level 13: Easy)

-Bug Fixes

-New collectibles

-Make the gameplay more fair and less challenging (kinda)

-Added some new particles when collecting the collectibles

-Added new text on how to beat the new stages (Stage 12 and Stage 13)

-and more

Also I fix the player movement well kinda. The code that I wrote sometimes work sometimes don't cause Construct is really buggy on these past weeks on my experience so if you get unlucky well blame Construct (pls dont)

I will participate in a Game Jam so no updates this week.

If you see some bugs pls report it to me. 

Have fun playing!
